about_the_game: DreamKiller is a 2D side-scrolling action game that combines strategy cards with intense combat. Control Irene as she navigates a world where dreams and reality merge, piecing together the shattered Dream Interpretation Codex. Use card-switching to unleash powerful skills in a Souls-like challenge.
detailed_description: DreamKiller is a 2D side-scrolling action game that combines strategy cards with intense combat. Control Irene as she navigates a world where dreams and reality merge, piecing together the shattered Dream Interpretation Codex. Use card-switching to unleash powerful skills in a Souls-like challenge.
name: 梦境少女demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 支持标准声卡
  • VR Support: 无
  • Additional Notes: 无

publishers: 游龙翼道软件开发工作室
short_description: Step into the world of Dream Demons, an independent land shattered by the curse of the Oneiroi, and follow the footsteps of Irene the Dreamless, looking for fragments of the dream code in the chaos of dreams and reality.
